column1: 33.  During cross-examination, the Plaintiff has further stated as follows:

column2: කමම සිදුවීමට කපර ඔෙ ගමනක් ගිෙොද?
කමම ස්ථොනකෙන් තමො එහො කමහො ෙනවො කන්ද?
පොර මැද දූපතක් පිහිටො තිකෙනවො කන්ද?
Did you go anywhere before this incident?
Did you see the obstruction at this?
You travel back and forth through this place, right?
In the middle of the road, there is an island, right?
This is not a place where there is an island.]”12
